titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide rate parity for open-loop and closed-loop biomass facilities under the renewable fuels tax credit.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide rate parity for open-loop and closed-loop biomass facilities under the renewable fuels tax credit.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the reduction in the rate of the tax credit for producing electricity from open-loop biomass facilities (thus making such rate equal to the tax credit rate for closed-loop biomass facilities).
